[docs]def preds_to_lists(preds):
    preds_list = {}
    for key, val in preds.items():
        if isinstance(val, list):
            preds_list[key] = [elem.tolist() for elem in val]
        elif isinstance(val, np.ndarray):
            preds_list[key] = val.tolist()
    return preds_list
